Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller

Interface DisplayMediator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteDisplayMediator
public interface DisplayMediator

Interface implemented by the central display controller

Makes the link between the Model (Player and RumourCardsPile) and the View (StdView and GuiView).

Specifies a set of methods which must be redefined to achieve all cases where a display associated with a Model's component has to be shown.

See Also:
  • ConcreteDisplayMediator
  • InputMediator

    • displayAddPlayersScreen

      void displayAddPlayersScreen(Tabletop tabletop)
      Requests the DM to display the "add players" screen.
      Parameters:
      tabletop - The match (instance of Tabletop) which is being set up

      void displayAddedPlayerScreen(Player p)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when one player has been added.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who has been added

    • displayAddedPlayersScreen

      void displayAddedPlayersScreen(int n)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation where all players have been added to the match.
      Parameters:
      n - The number of added players

    • logYesNoQuestion

      void logYesNoQuestion(String yesnoq)
      Requests the DM to display a yes-no question. Not in charge of getting the answer.
      Parameters:
      yesnoq - The yes-no question

    • displayGameIsTiedScreen

      void displayGameIsTiedScreen(List<Player> potentialWinners)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation where the game is tied.
      Parameters:
      potentialWinners - The list of all players all players with the highest score, that score being higher than 5.

    • distributeHandScreen

      void distributeHandScreen(int distributedCardsCount, int discardedCardsCount)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation where all cards have been distributed at the start of a Round.
      Parameters:
      distributedCardsCount - The number of Rumour cards given to each player
      discardedCardsCount - The number of cards directly put into the pile

      Parameters:
      p - The player revealing their identity.
      lastUnrevealedPlayer - The game's last remaining unrevealed player, or null.
      See Also:
      • Player::revealIdentity()

      void displayScoreUpdateScreen(Player p, int points)
      Requests the DM to notify the view of a change in a player's score.
      Parameters:
      p - the player earning or loosing points.
      points - the algebric value of the score update.
      See Also:
      • Player::addScore(int)

    • displayNoCardsScreen

      void displayNoCardsScreen(Player p)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has no playable cards left.
      Parameters:
      p - the player who has no more playable cards.

    • displayCard

      void displayCard(RumourCard rc, boolean forcedReveal)
      Requests the DM to display a single Rumour Card with its Witch, Hunt and additionnal effects.
      Parameters:
      rc - the Rumour Card to be displayed.
      forcedReveal - if false, the cards properties will be hidden if it is unrevealed.

    • displayWitchEffect

      void displayWitchEffect(RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to display a single Rumour Card with its Witch effect.
      Parameters:
      rc - The rumour card of which we want to display the Witch effect.

    • displayHuntEffect

      void displayHuntEffect(RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to display a single Rumour Card with its Hunt effect.
      Parameters:
      rc - The rumour card of which we want to display the Hunt effect.

    • displayCards

      void displayCards(RumourCardsPile rcp, boolean forcedReveal)
      Requests the DM to display all Rumour Cards within a pile, with all their characteristics.
      Parameters:
      rcp - a pile of Rumour Cards.
      forcedReveal - if false, the unrevealed Rumour Cards' properties will remain secret

    • displayWitchEffects

      void displayWitchEffects(RumourCardsPile rcp)
      Requests the DM to display all Rumour Cards within a pile, with their Witch effects.
      Parameters:
      rcp - a pile of Rumour Cards.

    • displayHuntEffects

      void displayHuntEffects(RumourCardsPile rcp)
      Requests the DM to display all Rumour Cards within a pile, with their Hunt effects.
      Parameters:
      rcp - a pile of Rumour Cards.

    • showCards

      void showCards(Player p)
      Requests the DM to display all Rumour Cards within a player's hand.
      Parameters:
      p - the player of whose hand we want to display
      See Also:
      • HumanPlayer::showHand()

    • displayPlayerChoseToWitchScreen

      void displayPlayerChoseToWitchScreen(Player player)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation where a player chose to play a Witch? effect.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who chose to play a Witch? effect

    • displayPlayerPlaysWitchEffectScreen

      void displayPlayerPlaysWitchEffectScreen(Player player, RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the use of the Witch effect of a Rumour Card by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player triggering a Witch effect.
      rc - the Rumour Card of which the Witch effect is triggered.

    • displayPlayerPlaysHuntEffectScreen

      void displayPlayerPlaysHuntEffectScreen(Player player, RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the use of the Hunt effect of a Rumour Card by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - : the player triggering a Hunt effect.
      rc - the Rumour Card of which the Hunt effect is triggered.

    • displayHasChosenCardScreen

      void displayHasChosenCardScreen(Player player, RumourCard chosen, RumourCardsPile from, boolean forceReveal)
      Requests the DM to notify the view when a card is taken by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player taking a card.
      chosen - The Rumour Card taken by the player.
      from - The pile of Rumour cards from which the card has been taken.
      forceReveal - if false : the taken Rumour Card's name and properties will remain hidden.

    • displayNoCardsInPileScreen

      void displayNoCardsInPileScreen(RumourCardsPile rcp)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a players polls the pile, the latter one is empty.
      Parameters:
      rcp - the common pile of discarded cards.

    • displayPlayerDiscardedCardScreen

      void displayPlayerDiscardedCardScreen(Player owner, RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player discarded one of its Rumour Cards.
      Parameters:
      owner - the player discarding the Rumour Card.
      rc - the Rumour Card discarded by the player.
      See Also:
      • Player::discard(RumourCard)

    • displayLookAtPlayersIdentityScreen

      void displayLookAtPlayersIdentityScreen(Player me, Player target)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player secretly looks at another player's identity.
      Parameters:
      me - the player looking at the target's identity.
      target - the target whose identity is being looked at.
      See Also:
      • Player::lookAtPlayersIdentity(Player)

    • secretlyDisplayIdentity

      void secretlyDisplayIdentity(Player target)
      Requests the DM to display the identity of a player victim of an effect allowing a player to look at it.
      Parameters:
      target - the target whos identity has been secretly looked at.

    • displayPlayerHasResetCardScreen

      void displayPlayerHasResetCardScreen(Player player, RumourCard chosenCard)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player has taken back one of their revealed cards.
      Parameters:
      player - the player taking back one of their revealed cards.
      chosenCard - the card that the player will be able to use again.

    • displayForcedToAccuseScreen

      void displayForcedToAccuseScreen(Player theOneWhoMustAccuse, Player theOneWhoForcedThem)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player was forced to accuse another player.
      Parameters:
      theOneWhoMustAccuse - the player who got forced to accuse a player.
      theOneWhoForcedThem - the player forcing their target to accuse any player but them (if possible).
      See Also:
      • Player::forceToAccuseNextTurn(Player)

    • displayStealCardScreen

      void displayStealCardScreen(Player thief, Player stolenPlayer)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player took a Rumour Card from the hand of another player.
      Parameters:
      thief - the player who took the Rumour Card.
      stolenPlayer - the player whose Rumour Card has been taken.
      See Also:
      • Player::takeRumourCard(RumourCard,Player)

    • passLog

      void passLog(String msg)

      Requests the associated display mediator to log a message.

      Used for debugging.

      Parameters:
      msg - a String.

    • displayStrategyChange

      void displayStrategyChange(Player p, PlayStrategy strat)
      Requests the DM to notify the view of a change of strategy by a CPU player
      Parameters:
      p - the player who changed their strategy
      strat - the strategy newly chosen
      See Also:
      • Game::displayChangesOfStrategy()

    • displayRanking

      void displayRanking(Player p, ScoreCounter sc)
      Requests the DM to display the players' ranking with their current score.
      Parameters:
      p - The (human) player requesting to display the ranking.
      sc - The game's score counter
      See Also:
      • ScoreCounter
      • HumanPlayer::showRanking()

    • displayScoreBoard

      void displayScoreBoard(ScoreCounter.ScoreBoard scoreBoard)
      Requests the DM to display a score board.
      Parameters:
      scoreBoard - The score board to be displayed.
      See Also:
      • ScoreBoard;

    • displayPossibilities

      void displayPossibilities(Menu possibilities)

      Given an instance of Menu representing a choice to be made for the game to continue, requests the DM to display its title and its choices.

      This method only manages the display of that Menu, user input is obtained using InputMediator::makeChoice.

      Parameters:
      possibilities - An instance of Menu, representing a choice to be made by a player for the game to continue
      See Also:
      • Menu

    • displayMenu

      void displayMenu(Menu m)
      Given an instance of Menu representing one of the application's menus, resquests the DM to display its title and choices.
      Parameters:
      m - An instance of Menu, representing one of the application's menus

    • displayExitingGameScreen

      void displayExitingGameScreen()
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation where the user chooses to exit the application.

    • displayNoAvailableHuntEffectsScreen

      void displayNoAvailableHuntEffectsScreen()
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation where a player has no available hunt effects

    • displaySelectCardScreen

      void displaySelectCardScreen(Player p, RumourCardsPile from, boolean forcedReveal)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to select a card.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who has to choose.
      from - The pile of Rumour cards within which any card must be selected.
      forcedReveal - If true, even unrevealed cards' properties will be shown.

    • displaySelectUnrevealedCardScreen

      void displaySelectUnrevealedCardScreen(Player p, RumourCardsPile from, boolean forcedReveal)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to select an unrevealed card.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who has to choose.
      from - A pile of Rumour cards containing only unrevealed cards.
      forcedReveal - If true, even unrevealed cards' properties will be shown.

    • displaySelectRevealedCardScreen

      void displaySelectRevealedCardScreen(Player p, RumourCardsPile from, boolean forcedReveal)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to select a revealed card.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who has to choose.
      from - from A pile of Rumour cards containing only revealed cards.
      forcedReveal - If true, even unrevealed cards' properties will be shown.

    • displaySelectWitchCardScreen

      void displaySelectWitchCardScreen(Player p, RumourCardsPile from)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to select a card with a valid Witch effect.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who has to choose a card with a valid Witch Effect
      from - A pile of Rumour cards containing only cards with a playable Witch? effect.

    • displaySelectHuntCardScreen

      void displaySelectHuntCardScreen(Player p, RumourCardsPile from)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to select a card with a valid Hunt effect.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who has to choose a card with a valid Hunt! effect.
      from - A pile of Rumour cards containing only cards with a playable Hunt! effect.

    • displayChooseCardToDiscardScreen

      void displayChooseCardToDiscardScreen(Player p)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to selecta card to discard.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who has to choose a card to discard
